name: Awakened Evil (itch)
description:
Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

Features:

  • Retro 80s graphics with some modern flair
  • Deliberate gameplay and controls for an oldschool challenge
  • Catchy chiptune soundtrack and sfx
  • 5 unique sub weapons to pick up on your journey
  • 6 intense stages that will have you fighting to the next checkpoint
  • Unlock Expert Mode for new enemies, areas, and more surprises!
  • Casual Mode, for those who prefer unlimited lives and extra checkpoints
  • Speedrun Modes for the full game and individual stages

Specs:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer OR Linux/X11
  • Processor: 1.9 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 55 MB available space

Controller (xbox)

  • Jump: A
  • Attack: X
  • Subweapon: Y
  • Pause: Start

Keyboard

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: A
  • Attack: S
  • Subweapon: D
  • Pause: Space
  • Accept: Enter
  • Cancel: Esc

*Controls can be changed in Options*

**All versions are unsigned apps, so they might be flagged by your OS or Antivirus.
